products.name: Cinnamoroll Plushie 70cm

products.description: A soft and cozy Kuromi-themed pillow. Made from plush material, measuring 100cm. A perfect addition for comfort and decoration.

products.name: Sanrio Stationery Set
products.description: A complete Sanrio-themed stationery set. Includes notebooks, stickers, pens, and more. Perfect for students and collectors alike.

products.name: Kuromi Slippers Purple
products.description: Stylish and comfortable Kuromi slippers. Made from soft plush, perfect for indoor use. Available in a beautiful purple color.

products.name: Kuromi Quartz Watch Steel
products.description: A sleek Kuromi quartz watch. Made of durable stainless steel, suitable for daily wear. A great gift for Sanrio enthusiasts.

products.name: Kuromi Keychain
products.description: A cute Kuromi keychain for fans. Made of quality plastic and rubber, perfect for bags, keys, or as a collectible accessory.

products.name: Cinnamoroll Sticker Box
products.description: A set of adorable Cinnamoroll stickers. Ideal for decorating notebooks, laptops, and more. A great choice for Sanrio lovers.

products.name: Plushie Pompompurin
products.description: A soft and cuddly Pompompurin plushie. Features an adorable outfit, making it a must-have for collectors and Sanrio fans.

products.name: Pompompurin Constructor
products.description: A fun 300-piece Pompompurin construction set. Great for creative play and display. A wonderful collectible for puzzle lovers.

products.name: Hello Kitty Pillow Toy
products.description: A charming Hello Kitty pillow toy. Soft, huggable, and 50cm in size. A perfect combination of comfort and decoration. Perfect present for valentine!

products.name: Kuromi Backpack
products.description: Kuromi backpack, textile, lilac color. Compact and stylish, featuring a spacious main compartment and comfortable straps. Perfect for everyday use.

products.name: Cinammonroll Plushie
products.description: Cinnamoroll plushie soft, cuddly, and adorable! Made from high-quality plush material, featuring Cinnamoroll’s signature floppy ears and sweet expression. Perfect for hugs, decoration, or as a gift for any Sanrio fan.

products.name: Cinammonroll Stickers
products.description: Cinnamoroll stickers cute and colorful! Featuring adorable designs of Cinnamoroll in various poses, perfect for decorating laptops, notebooks, phone cases, and more. A must-have for any Sanrio fan!

products.name: Pompompurin squish toy
products.description: Pompompurin squish toy – soft, squeezable, and super cute! Made from slow-rising, high-quality material, featuring Pompompurin’s signature beret and cheerful expression. Perfect for stress relief, decoration, or as a fun gift for Sanrio fans!

products.name: Pompompurin drinking cup
products.description: Pompompurin drinking cup adorable and practical! Features a cute Pompompurin design, made from durable material, perfect for both hot and cold drinks. A great addition to any Sanrio fans collection!

products.name: Pompompurin stationary set
products.description: Pompompurin stationery set cute and functional! Includes pens, notebooks, stickers, and more, all featuring adorable Pompompurin designs. Perfect for school, work, or creative journaling. A must-have for any Sanrio fan!

products.name: Hello Kitty hair brush
products.description: Hello Kitty hairbrush  cute and stylish! Features an ergonomic design with soft bristles for gentle detangling. Adorned with an adorable Hello Kitty design, perfect for everyday hair care and Sanrio fans of all ages!

products.name: Hello Kitty ear Mufflers
products.description: Hello Kitty ear mufflers cozy and adorable! Featuring a soft, plush design with cute Hello Kitty details, they provide warmth and comfort during cold weather. Perfect for Sanrio fans who want to stay stylish and snug!

products.name: Hello Kitty Plushie
products.description: Hello Kitty plush toy, 30 cm tall, multicolor. Soft and huggable, featuring Hello Kitty’s iconic bow and sweet expression. A perfect gift or collectible for Sanrio fans of all ages!

products.name: Hello Kitty hair claw
products.description: Hello Kitty hair claw cute and practical! Features a sturdy grip with an adorable Hello Kitty design, perfect for securing hair stylishly and comfortably. A must-have accessory for Sanrio fans!

products.name: Hello Kitty Mug
products.description: Hello Kitty mug cute and stylish! Features an adorable Hello Kitty design, made from high-quality material, perfect for hot and cold drinks. A great addition to any Sanrio fans collection!

products.name: Pochacco constructor
products.description: Pochacco constructor – fun and collectible! A buildable set featuring the adorable Pochacco character, perfect for Sanrio fans and creative builders. Made from high-quality materials, great for display or play!

products.name: Pochacco secret toy kit
products.description: Pochacco secret toy kit – a fun mystery surprise! Each kit includes a hidden Pochacco-themed toy or accessory, perfect for Sanrio fans who love collectibles. Cute, exciting, and great for gifting!

products.name: Pochacco Amusement park
products.description: Pochacco amusement park playset – fun and adorable! Features a colorful theme park design with Pochacco and friends, including rides and accessories. Perfect for Sanrio fans to create magical playtime adventures!

products.name: Pochacco Damo Egg
products.description: Pochacco Damo Egg – a fun and creative building set! This constructor comes in an egg-shaped package and features Pochacco-themed blocks to assemble. Perfect for Sanrio fans who love building and collecting cute figures!

products.name: Top Toy Pochacco
products.description: A fun and detailed building set with **300 pieces**! This constructor allows you to assemble an adorable Pochacco figure, perfect for Sanrio fans and collectors. Made from high-quality materials for a sturdy and enjoyable building experience!
